channel.title: Refined Power - Dyson sphere missing?
channel.description: I have installed the "Refined Power" mod, and it works perfectly. Only the Dyson sphere is missing. I have unlocked everything up to the arc reactor in Tier7, but I cannot build the Dyson sphere hangars. They do not appear in the build menu, nor are there any milestones in the hub-terminal. What am I missing?

item.title: Refined Power - Dyson sphere missing?
item.dc:creator: @donald_curry Donald Curry
item.description:
@donald_curry wrote:

you figure this out? i have it missing with other stuff on the milestones before it, if the solar and batteries

Read full topic

item.title: Refined Power - Dyson sphere missing?
item.dc:creator: @Flow_Q Flow Q
item.description:
@Flow_Q wrote:

I have installed the “Refined Power” mod, and it works perfectly. Only the Dyson sphere is missing. I have unlocked everything up to the arc reactor in Tier7, but I cannot build the Dyson sphere hangars. They do not appear in the build menu, nor are there any milestones in the hub-terminal. What am I missing?

Read full topic
